title: House Mokusei / atelier yoo
description: This project concerns the renovation of a century-old Kyo-machiya located in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto. The goal was to transform the traditional townhouse into a lodging facility for travelers.
author: Valeria Silva
byline: Curated by 韩爽 - HAN Shuang
excerpt: Completed in 2025 in Kyoto, Japan. Images by Song Gao , Kazuoki Yasugi. This project concerns the renovation of a century-old Kyo-machiya located in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto. The goal was to transform the traditional...

Text description provided by the architects. This project concerns the renovation of a century-old Kyo-machiya located in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto. The goal was to transform the traditional townhouse into a lodging facility for travelers.
